column1: short of a length and some outswing outside off. Left alone
slight shape in at the corridor from back of a length. He opens the face and chops it to third man
short of a length on leg stump, tapped to square leg on the up
length ball with some wobble down leg side, can't get bat on the attempted flick
full on middle stump, stands tall and flicks easily through square leg for his first runs in the IPL
length ball outside off, leans in nicely to tap on the up. Can't get it past cover though. Bit of a mix-up as they're both ball watching. Short runs back after covering half the pitch

direct hit from Williamson! Short is struggling. Sunrisers' captain swoops in from mid-off to pick up his mistimed drive and fells the stumps...Short is caught short. Stunning work from Williamson. Short took off early for the run after punching on the up but there wasn't one there
good length outswinger, wide outside off. Left alone
short of a length just outside off, tapped back at the bowler off the back foot
short of a length and wide outside off with some movement away. A lazy waft by Samson that would've been called lazy elegance if he had made connection. He's beaten though
short of a length and in at leg stump, dabbed to fine leg's left off the back foot
shot. Sweetly timed. Length ball angled in at him and he punches it through midwicket
caressed through cover point. Lovely timing. No meet at all, but his hands are nicely behind this outswinger outside off. Punches through the line with no fuss
length on middle stump, whipped to mid-on off the back foot
shot! This is an unreal shot. Length ball in the corridor and once again, without any feet, he gets behind an outswinger. The unreal part? He's whipped it wide of mid-on, on the up. Genius.
length on middle stump, tapped to mid-on's right on the up
full on middle stump, flicked to mid-on
legcutter. On a length just outside off. Looks to flick but gets a leading edge towards mid-off
full ball, floated in at leg stump. Looks to flick through the open midwicket region and can't get bat on it
length on middle stump, flicked straight to square leg
shot. Length ball, seam-up and coming in at off stump. Steps out and slaps it through extra cover on the up
length ball on middle stump, steps out and jams it to mid-on
good length on middle stump, flicked to long-on
length on leg stump, flicked straight to square leg
low full toss on the pads, flicked to fine leg's left
shot. Arches into the leg side to make room against this short, rising ball in the corridor. It's at 147kph so all he does is get his hands under it and slice it wide of third man
length ball at off stump, closes the face and gets a leading edge to third man
mean bouncer! Samson is stuck on the crease with no idea where this has gone as he shapes to pull. It's way over his head though
short of a length ball on leg stump, whipped to deep square
leading edge flies over point. It's a good ball from Stanlake. 146kph outswinger at a good length, wide outside off. He's looking to flick it and he finds the point boundary
short of a length outside off, guided to third man with soft hands
good length on middle stump, pushes forward to flick straight to midwicket
not hit too well but he finds the boundary. Steps out preemptively and is beaten in flight, but this is coming into him and he uses the angle to lift it over midwicket
short of a length outside off, punched to mid-off off the back foot
good length on leg stump, tapped uppishly to long-on
big appeal for lbw but Rahane has gotten well outside off stump for this attempted sweep. It's a full ball, not there for the sweep
dropped short and he quickly gets on the back foot to swat this to deep square
under edge into the pitch as he looks to pull a length ball from outside off
length outside off, punched on the rise to sweeper cover
bouncer dug in too short and wide outside off. Sails past the bat as he looks to hook
falls short of third man where Stanlake is stationed. Rahane steps out and loses shape as he looks to slog across the line to this length ball in the corridor
short of a length outside off, opens the face and slices to sweeper cover

picks out Rashid Khan in the deep! No, correction - Rashid Khan picks him up in the deep! This is a sprinting, sliding catch to his left at deep square leg. Rahane down the track again to meet the length ball at middle stump. It's a nicely timed flick and it's fairly wide of the fielder but he has held on without losing his balance
nicely done. Short of a length ball rising up in the corridor. Waits for it to arrive and opens the face to run it past the keeper
length ball spinning down leg side, he can't get bat on it. Cops it on the pad
beaten outside off. Or so the umpire thinks. Rashid pushes a slider across Stokes and he can't connect on the reverse sweep. Rashid thinks theremight be glove on that, but they won't review
trapped in front of middle but he's got an inside edge on that. Another slider from Rashid, traps him on the back foot as he looks to nudge this into the leg side
length ball on leg stump, tickled through square leg off the inside half of the bat
length outside off, punched to extra coevr on the up
inside edge onto pad! Oh Samson's a lucky man. Doesn't pick this googly and has all his stumps exposed as he looks to cut
bouncer on a leg stump line, gets the head out of the way and plays a controlled hook to fine leg
length in the corridor, whipped to long-on, on the up
short of a length outside off, closes the face and drags this between deep square and fine leg
short ball at middle stump, swats uppishly to deep square
yorker on middle stump, flicked to long-on off his toes

taken on the second attempt! Williamson at long-on. Stokes looks to pummel a length ball over long-on from outside off. He hits it flat to long-on's left and Williamson loses his grip on the ball as he goes towards the floor. Then, he recovers and lunges ahead to hold on
tossed up outside off, punched to long-off on the up
good length, slow and just outside off. Pushes with soft hands through cover
yorker on off stump. Digs it out into the cover region and steals the single
short ball skidding in at off stump. Makes room and has placed this cut nicely, but point dives to the right and parries this to sweeper cover
short of a length and in at leg stump. Gets on the back foot and pulls to long-on's right
length on leg stump, flicks to deep midwicket's right and steals the second as Dhawan fumbles
length ball just outside off, hurried on the cover drive. It bounces away to sweeper
short of a length on off stump, punched to long-on off the front foot
short ball outside off, too fast for him again. Beaten on the cut
length ball outside off, zips up as Tripathi shapes to play a cover drive on the up. Flies through to the keeper at chest height
short ball at off stump, gets on top and drops it into the point region with soft hands
length ball just outside off, runs it to point's left on the up
googly, back of a length at off stump. Punched to long-off off the back foot
short ball turning away outside off. Drags it to long-on off the back foot
thick outside edge as he gets on the back foot and looks to stab at this with a closed face. It's a length ball at middle stump, turning away
well placed. Rashid gives away the googly early by lobbing it wide outside off. Tripathi leans in, gets to the pitch and lifts it wide of long-off
jabbed wide of slip after being beaten in flight. Pushes on the front foot and then follow it with his hands as it spins away
googly, pushed flat at a length outside off. Mistimed sweep along the floor to deep midwicket's right

Saha and the bowler have convinced Williamson to take the review on this lbw. It's a bat-first-or-pad situation. He's looking to defend this length ball on the front foot and he's caught unaware by the skid...it is pad first. But he's managed to just get outside the line. They'll lose the review and the decision stands.
short of a length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
short ball just outside off, pulled to long-on off the front foot

appeal for lbw again but it's turned down. Kaul is deceptive off the surface and skids another in at middle stump. Samson looking to punch through midwicket off the back foot. There's an inside edge on that but the umpire says it's leg bye

falls short of third man. They're finding some serious pace off this surface. Tripathi steps out and is surprised by the short ball. Looks to hook and gets a leading edge that lands in front of the diving Stanlake
length outside off, tapped to extra cover off the back foot
length on leg stump, steps out and yorks himself. Taps it back to the bowler

picks out long-on. This was coming. A loopy arm ball on a good length. Tripathi doesn't get close enough for his attempted slog and ends up dragging it flat to Pandey's right at long-on, off the inside half of the bat
flighted length ball on middle stump. Presses forward and dabs this to long-on, against the turn
length ball on off stump, tapped to point's right off the back foot

sliding Rashid completes the job for Shakib! Superb bowling, superb catching. He pushes this very slow, very wide outside off in anticipation of him stepping out. And he does. Has to reach out in the end and he slices it high. Rashid sprins in rapidly from sweeper, slides on his knees and holds on
length ball outside off, punched to deep extra cover on the up
beaten by pace. Again. Kaul has been unreadable off the pitch. This isn't a great ball though, short and wide. Too late on the cut
good length and in at off stump, tapped to long-on on the up
good length, angled into the corridor. Chopped straight to point
caught behind! Bit tired of saying this now - Kaul surprises him. Gets it to rise sharply from back of a length. He's stuck between a pull and a fend. It lobs up easily for Saha off his front thumb
fizzes past the bat. Too quick in the corridor and just the perfect length to get it at face height. Batsman has no idea
length ball at off stump, sliced to sweeper cover on the up
dabs it past first slip nonchalantly. The other legspiner in this game. Picks this legbreak off the surface and uses his hands to steer it nicely
tossed up outside off and drilled wide of sweeper cover off the front foot
googly not picked. He's backing away for a late cut and is cramped. Manages to nudge it into the leg side
googly, back of a length and in at middle stump. Tapped to deep midwicket off the back foot
beats the outside edge with a flat legbreak outside off. Pushes on the front foot to defend. Saha can't hold on
short of a length just outside off, sliced to backward point
good length and in at off stump. Tapped to extra cover on the up
bouncer dug in too short. No chance he's going to hit that
shot! Expertly placed. Length ball just outside off and he carves this cover drive well to the right of sweeper cover with a drive on the up
short of a length just outside off, steered to third man with an open face
legcutter, length ball outside off. Flicks it to long-on on the up
length ball and in at leg stump. Dabbed through square leg with soft hands
legcutter, full on leg stump. Flicked to long-on
short of a length slider outside off, can't get bat on the cut

drags it on! Googly does Buttler. It's a third dismissal against Rashid after all. It's short of a length and he jumps onto the back foot to try and bludgeon this over midwicket with a pull. Through the shot early and it kisses the inside edge before tonking the stumps
googly, back of a length and in at leg stump. Whips it wide of short fine off the back foot
Rashid thinks he has the outside edge but Llong says no. The perfect legbreak. Zipping past the outside edge as he closes the face on this. It's flicked the back pad on the way to Saha
short of a length outside off, late cut straight to backward point
googly. Beaten in flight as he steps out. Ends up having to kick it away towards short fine
short of a length just outside off. Steers it to short third man who fires at the stumps and gives a second run at deep midwicket
legcutter. Pitches off, cuts away marginally to beats the outside edge as he looks to run it to third man
length ball outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the toe-end
gets him on the glove. Kulkarni takes his eyes off the ball as he shapes to hook. Too quick. It lobs pitch side but the bowler can't get to it
backs away and jabs at this short ball. Gets it out to third man
bouncer fizzes above the head. Surprisingly, that's the first bouncer called for the over.
finds long-on. Knuckle ball on a length at off stump. Gets under it and puts in a clean swing. But it's off the low part of the bat
short ball at a middle stump line. Backs away and hoicks at it. Can't connect
short of a length just outside off, backs away and carves it to third man's right. Then comes back for a suicidal second run. Saha takes down all three stumps, the batsman is four yards out.
short of a length in the corridor, steered to third man with an open face
yorker at the stumps. Makes room and carves it out to sweeper cover
bouncer outside off. Looks for the upper cut but that's not an option tonight
short ball in the corridor. Looks to pull through midwicket and can't get bat as this flies past
short of length ball that nips away from off stump, steered to Stokes at gully
length on middle and leg, tucked gently towards deep square to get off the mark
mistimes an attempted drive to extra cover. Didn't get the kind of width he would've liked
full, hint of swing back in from outside off, Dhawan shapes to go through extra cover, mistimes it to mid-off
shapes to pull but lets go this short ball slanting away. Got big on him. Good carry through to Buttler

dropped! Straight in, straight out. Oh, Rahane. What have you done? Dhawan has a slash to a delivery that isn't wide enough for him to flay through point, flies at a comfortable height to the captain who makes a royal mess of that one. Bobbled out, tried to grab on the second attempt but couldn't.
swatted away! Wow, incredible. It's a rising length ball at off stump and he closes the face and chips it over square leg
length ball angled across off stump. Dabbed to cover off the front foot
bouncer. Flies over the head. As it has been all evening. Buttler leaps and catches with his right hand
can't clear mid-off. Length ball slanted across off stump and he looks to loft this on the up. Gets it off the toe-end and Laughlin takes running to his left
straigthens in the corridor and zips past the outside edge. Back of a length and he can't get behind this on the back foot defence
outside edge over first slip. Oh boy, they're hitting the right lengths. This is rising at his chest as he steps out and looks to cut
gets inside the line this time and pulls it from the ribs to fine leg
length ball pushed wide outside off and he spanks this on the up. Gets a lot of bat on it too, but Short stops low to his right at short extra
finds the gap this time. Length ball pushed wide again and he hammers it through cover point
short and wide outside off. Slashes and misses
short of a length outside off, punched straight to point off the back foot
shot! Uses the trampoline bounce to lift this over third man with an upper cut. He's assessed the pitch nicely and predicts exactly where he'll have to meet that ball as it slants across the corridor
yikes. Bouncer very short, pitching outside leg, and sliding further down
length in the corridor. Looks to drop it pitch side to take a single but can't get it wide of the bowler
length ball at off stump, defended off the back foot
short of a length outside off, stabbed into the covers on the up
nicely played. Late, allowing the length ball to angle across and then using it to get his hands through the line. Sliced, with full balance, through cover point
offcutter, back of a length at middle stump. Pushed into the leg side off the back foot
shot of the night! Ridiculously easy from Williamson. Short of a length ball but he shuffles quickly into the off side and picks this from under his arm and to clear square leg boundary
short of a length on leg stump, gets on top of the bounce and nudges it through square leg with soft hands. Comes back for the second too
skids it in at leg stump from a good length. Can't get this off the pitch as he looks to flick
short of a length and angled in at middle stump. Plonks the front leg across and scoops this over short fine with the angle
length ball outside off, spinning away but it's no worry for Dhawan. Drives through the line and open the face to get it between short third man and point
length ball pushed through flat at middle stump. Nudged through midwicket from the crease
full on off stump, pushed down the pitch
back of a length on off stump, punched back towards mid-off
short of a length just outside off. Drops it into the off side with soft hands for the single. It's also a no-ball. Free hit coming up
taken at mid-on. Williamson backs away and looks to pull this from outside off. Gets it straight to the fielder off the toe-end
short of a length in the corridor, dabbed into the gully region with soft hands
short ball at leg stump, backs into the off side and heaves at this. It takes his glove and lobs past the keeper before running away. There is no justice
length outside off, punched on the front foot to extra cover
length on leg stump, pushed deftly through square leg
oh glorious. Give us eleven of this guy. Hangs on the back foot to this length ball outside off and opens the face late to drive this between point and cover. Neither of them had a chance
googly dug in short. It's spinning well past off stump but there's enough time. He gets on the back foot and bruteforces this to the midwicket fence
top edge against the next googly, which is also short and spinning away from off. But there's no one at square leg
length ball on off, blocked on the front foot
length ball on middle, steps out and pokes to long-on
slider just outside off, punched straight to extra cover off the back foot
length ball on leg stump, tickled to deep square's right off the back foot
too easy. Dropped short in the corridor and he gets on the toes of his back leg to swat this uppishly between deep square and deep midwicket
attempted yorker is pitching well outside leg. Reaches out and tickles this fine. The fielder makes it to the ball but the slide is not quick enough
Short has a direct hit with an underarm flick from extra cover. Williamson has made it. Third umpire confirms. Dhawan blocked this length ball off the front foot
short of a length outside off, guided to third man
slower ball, full and very wide. Left alone
short ball in the corridor. Jabs at it away from the body and is beaten
slower ball at a length, wide outside off. Looks to slap it on the up and gets an under-edge towards point
back of a length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
short ball at middle stump, gets on his back knee and flat-bats this to deep backward square
googly, back of a length on off. Gets on the back foot and looks to punch towards long-off. Gopal leaps to his left to stop one-handed
length on off stump, steps out, is beaten in flight and is forced to block this
back of a length on middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
slider, back of a length at off stump. Pulled to deep midwicket
short ball outside off, chopped to the point boundary. It's that simple for Dhawan today. Brings up his fifty
full outside off, mistimed drive straight to mid-off
carted! What power. Stokes having an ordinary time. Length ball wide outside off and he climbs into this, on the up
direct hit has prompted the umpire to send this upstairs. He was looking to sneak a single on the leg side but was sent back by Williamson. It's a direct hit, but Dhawan has made his ground
bouncer at off stump, pulled to deep square leg
short of a length on middle, shuffles and pulls to deep square
length on middle stump, steps out and drills it straight to mid-on
back of a length on off stump, punched to long-off

full googly outside leg stump. Looks to sweep and gets this to short fine. It's hit his leg and deflected towards short fine. The lbw appeal is turned down. They're reviewing it though. It will stay not out, pitching outside leg...but it will eat up about three minutes because of the review process. In fact, they give it not out because there's a spike as the ball passes bat
good length on off stump, pushed to extra cover off the front foot
lifts it past the bowler who is swaying away from it. Williamson hasn't connected this as well as he might have liked. Ends up slicing it a touch, but he's got right to pitch of length ball
short ball, pulled out to deep midwicket
short of a length just outside off, whipped to midwicket's left off the back foot. Short leaps to his left there and pushes it back towards the bowler
slow floated from Laughlin. On a good length, swaying away from off. He gets on the front foot and drops it in front of point with soft hands
slower ball at a length outside off. Driven straight to mid-off on the up
short ball at middle stump, pulled to deep square
the away-floater again. Picked this time as it lands outside off on a very full length. Driven to sweeper's left
length ball wide outside off. Gets down on one knee and slaughters this on the up, wide of mid-off
bouncer on middle stump, pulled to deep square
dropped short on middle stump, gets behind the line and pulls it between deep square and deep midwicket
length on leg stump, nudged through midwicket with soft hands
short ball outside off, under-edges the cut towards point
steps out and blocks with his body. He's beaten in flight here
past the outside edge and past the keeper. A nicely tossed up length ball outside off. He doesn't get to the pitch for the drive through cover and it spins a long way past him
short of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
short of a length ball just outside off. Gets on the back foot and slices it over midwicket with a pull
length ball outside off, steps out and punches to extra cover on the bounce
short ball outside off, punched firmly off the back foot to sweeper's right. Kulkarni puts in a slide there to stop it
offcutter, back of a length outside off. Backs away and cuts to sweeper
length ball at middle stump. Shuffles and nudges this to short fine's right
tossed up outside off, drags to long-on off the front foot
googly. Floated up full on leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
short ball just outside off, cut straight to backward point
short of a length wide outside off, cut uppishly to point's left. He parries it to sweeper cover
full on leg stump, paddle sweep straight to short fine
short of a length just outside off, punched straight to extra cover
short and wide outside off. Looks to cut and it skids through from under his bat
slower short ball climbing across off stump. Can't get bat on the hook
short of a length just outside off, punched uppishly to mid-off
full and wide outside off. Chases and tries to jam it through point. Beaten
finishes with a boundary. A domineering win finished with an imperious shot. Short of a length in the corridor and he gets behind it to swat it over midwicket
